description:
This Course is perfect for the new and upcoming Game developer!

This course is about creating a platform in Construct 2, we are focusing on the concepts of the game... (publishing might come in a later tutorial)

so expect to learn the basics of creating game logic, and getting a prototype game up and running!

Graphics used in this tutorial are by Kenney (but this can be done with any art!)

3 Sound Effects are made by me, and 1 soundtrack made by a contact for me! (if you use the soundtrack credit him by putting soundcloud com/irvn in your game credits)

This also includes a zipped capx file!

This course shouldn't take more than a day to complete (but there is enough content that it might take a bit longer to get all the info in this packed Video Course)

This course is structured from easiest to hardest!

This Course is recorded in my male voice, on my Blue Yeti, in a resolution of 1920x1200 (which means everything should be nice and readable if you have a fast internet speed!)

why should you take this course?

My voice: Check my preview for a sample (nearly 3 hours of my bass voice)(PS: I had to trim my preview because udemy has a 2 min maximum)(if you don't like my voice, then this course isn't for you)

HD Video: 1920x1200 is HIGH HD, and looks wonderful!

Simple to understand!

For Beginners!

I as the instructor love to help with any questions you have!

See you inside!

Justin / ~Ant
title: Construct 2 For Beginners
